heading: HB08116
0: AN ACT DECLARING THE TUGBO WATERSHED FOREST RESERVE (TWFR) SITUATED IN THE CITY OF MASBATE AND IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF MOBO, PROVINCE OF MASBATE, ISLAND OF LUZON AS PROTECTED AREA PURSUANT TO REPUBLIC ACT 7586, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE NATIONAL INTEGRATED PROTECTED AREAS SYSTEM (NIPAS) ACT OF 1992 AND SHALL BE KNOWN AS TUGBO NATURAL BIOTIC AREA (TNBA), APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on NATURAL RESOURCES since 2018-08-28
